title.narrative: EARLY CHILDHOOD POLICY

description.narrative: Technical and financial assistance for the design and implementation of National Campaigns and Communication for Development (C4D) initiatives to inform and mobilize families, especially of excluded populations, and institutions, to register the births of children promptly., which contributes to Early Learning, Learning Outcomes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By the end of 2019 children 0-5 years old, especially the 1.6 million living in extreme poverty, have their rights to survival, development, protection and participation guaranteed through comprehensive early child development policies, and children 6-11 years old have equitable access to quality primary school, with special attention to indigenous girls and boys.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Technical and financial assistance for the design and implementation of National Campaigns and C4D initiatives to inform andmobilize families, especially of excluded populations, and institutions, to register the births of children promptly.

description.narrative: UNICEF has mainly focused on two areas of intervention: policy development and capacity building. In policy development, UNICEF contributed to the design and the approval process of the National Comprehensive ECD policy in collaboration with the National ECD Commission; as well as to the design of the National Initial Education Programme in collaboration with the MoE. In capacity development, UNICEF supported the implementation of the initial education curriculum for day-care centre supervisors of the Mexican Institute for Social Security (IMSS) nationwide. | Status:Met | As-of Date:23/01/2020

actual.value: 2018:Por lo menos, 500,000 familias mas se beneficiaran de la reimpresion de materiales de la estrategia de Desarrollo infantil temprano con la imagen institucional actual: Colgante: 500,000 ejemplares; Rotafolios: 15,000 ejemplares; y CDs: 4000.
